alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:12PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM MST... At 212 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rimmy Jims, or 14 miles northwest of Winslow, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rimmy Jims. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 234 and 245. State Route 99 between mile markers 53 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
